00036	function Created()
00037	{
00038	    local int i;
00039	
00040	    Super.Created();
00041	
00042	   for (i=0; i<10; i++)
00043	    {
00044	        //tHighlight[i] = texture(DynamicLoadObject(sHighlight[i], class'Texture'));
00045	        tBackGround[i] = texture(DynamicLoadObject(sBackGround[i], class'Texture'));
00046	    }
00047	
00048	    // Document Type
00049	        DocumentCombo = XIIIComboControl(CreateControl(class'XIIIComboControl', 260, 380*fScaleTo, 340,40*fScaleTo));
00050	    //DocumentCombo.Text = Doc1Text;
00051	    //DocumentCombo.bSmallFont = true;
00052	    DocumentCombo.bArrows = true;
00053	    //DocumentCombo.bAlwaysFocus = true;
00054	    IterateDocuments();
00055	    Controls[0] = DocumentCombo;
00056	
00057	
00058	}
00059	
00060	function IterateDocuments()
00061	{
00062		local int i;
00063		
00064		for (i=0;i<3;i++)
00065		{
00066			
00067			
00068			DocumentCombo.AddItem(ObjectName[i]);
00069			
00070		}
00071	
00072		DocumentCombo.SetSelectedIndex(0);
00073	}

00085	function Paint(Canvas C, float X, float Y)
00086	{
00087		local float fScale, fHeight, W, H;
00088	
00089	        super.paint(C,X,Y);     
00090	
00091		// big black border behind documents
00092		 C.bUseBorder = true;
00093		 DrawStretchedTexture(C, 180*fRatioX, 36*fRatioY*fScaleTo, 430*fRatioX, 368*fRatioY*fScaleTo, myRoot.FondMenu);
00094	
00095		// document itself
00096		 //C.bUseBorder = true;
00097		// DrawStretchedTexture(C, 190*fRatioX, 46*fRatioY*fScaleTo, 410*fRatioX, 348*fRatioY*fScaleTo, tBackGround[texturenb]);
00098	
00099	
00100		// image behind title
00101		//DrawStretchedTexture(C, 40*fRatioX, 36*fRatioY*fScaleTo, 130*fRatioX, 80*fRatioY*fScaleTo, tBackGround[0]);
00102		C.bUseBorder = false;
00103		switch(texturenb)
00104		{
00105		case 0 :
00106		   DrawStretchedTexture(C, 190*fRatioX, 69*fRatioY*fScaleTo, 410*fRatioX, 174*fRatioY*fScaleTo, tBackGround[0]);
00107		break;
00108		case 1 :
00109	           DrawStretchedTexture(C, 190*fRatioX, 46*fRatioY*fScaleTo, 205*fRatioX, 348*fRatioY*fScaleTo, tBackGround[1]);
00110	           DrawStretchedTexture(C, 395*fRatioX, 46*fRatioY*fScaleTo, 205*fRatioX, 348*fRatioY*fScaleTo, tBackGround[2]);
00111		break;
00112		case 2 :
00113	           DrawStretchedTexture(C, 190*fRatioX, 46*fRatioY*fScaleTo, 410*fRatioX, 348*fRatioY*fScaleTo, tBackGround[3]);
00114		break;
00115		case 3 :
00116		   DrawStretchedTexture(C, 190*fRatioX, 46*fRatioY*fScaleTo, 410*fRatioX, 348*fRatioY*fScaleTo, tBackGround[3]);
00117		break;
00118		case 4 :
00119	           DrawStretchedTexture(C, 190*fRatioX, 46*fRatioY*fScaleTo, 410*fRatioX, 348*fRatioY*fScaleTo, tBackGround[4]);
00120		break;
00121	
00122		}
00123		
00124		 // Title
00125		 C.bUseBorder = true;
00126		 DrawStretchedTexture(C, 30*fRatioX, 70*fRatioY*fScaleTo, 140*fRatioX, 32*fRatioY*fScaleTo, myRoot.FondMenu);
00127		 C.TextSize(TitleText, W, H);
00128		 C.DrawColor = BlackColor;
00129		 C.SetPos((30*fRatioX + (140*fRatioX-W)/2), (70*fRatioY+(32*fRatioY-H)/2)*fScaleTo); C.DrawText(TitleText, false);
00130		 C.bUseBorder = false;
00131		 C.DrawColor = WhiteColor;
00132	
00133	
00134		// image behind object name
00135		C.bUseBorder = false;
00136		DrawStretchedTexture(C, 50*fRatioX, 196*fRatioY, 98*fRatioX, 98*fRatioY, tBackGround[9]);
00137		
00138		 // object name
00139		 C.bUseBorder = true;
00140		 DrawStretchedTexture(C, 30*fRatioX, 280*fRatioY*fScaleTo, 140*fRatioX, 32*fRatioY*fScaleTo, myRoot.FondMenu);
00141		 C.TextSize(Doc2Text, W, H);
00142		 C.DrawColor = BlackColor;
00143		 C.SetPos((30*fRatioX + (140*fRatioX-W)/2), (280*fRatioY+(32*fRatioY-H)/2)*fScaleTo); C.DrawText(Doc2Text, false);
00144		 C.bUseBorder = false;
00145		 C.DrawColor = WhiteColor;
00146	
00147	
00148	
00149	}

00151	
00152	function bool InternalOnKeyEvent(out byte Key, out byte State, float delta)
00153	{
00154		if ((State==1) || (state==2))// IST_Press // to avoid auto-repeat
00155		{
00156	        if ((Key==0x08/*IK_Escape*/) || (Key==0x1B))
00157	        {
00158	            Index = 6;
00159	            Message = 
00160	                "?Transmitted="$Emission$
00161	                "?Ind="$Index;
00162	            log("Message = "$Message);
00163	            myRoot.CloseMenu(true,Message);
00164	            //myRoot.CloseMenu(true,Description);
00165	            //myRoot.OpenMenu("XIDInterf.XIIIMenuDocument",,Description);
00166	            return true;
00167	        }
00168			if (Key==0x26/*IK_Up*/)
00169			{
00170				PrevControl(FocusedControl);
00171				return true;
00172			}
00173			if (Key==0x28/*IK_Down*/)
00174			{
00175				NextControl(FocusedControl);
00176				return true;
00177			}
00178			if ((Key==0x25) || (Key==0x27))
00179			{
00180				OnMenu = FindComponentIndex(FocusedControl);
00181				if (OnMenu == 0)
00182				{
00183					if (Key==0x25) OnGame--;
00184					if (Key==0x27) OnGame++;
00185					if (OnGame < 0) OnGame = 0;
00186					else if (OnGame > 3-1) OnGame = 3-1;
00187					DocumentCombo.SetSelectedIndex(OnGame);
00188					texturenb = OnGame;
00189					//paint();
00190					//DocumentChanged(OnGame);
00191				}
00192				return true;
00193			}
00194		}
00195		return super.InternalOnKeyEvent(Key, state, delta);
00196	}
00197	
00198	
00199	event HandleParameters(string Param1, string Param2)
00200	{
00201	    Description = localParseOption(Param1,"Emission","");
00202	    log("Emission = "$Description);
00203	    Index = int(localParseOption(Param1,"Ind",""));
00204	    Emission=Description;
00205	}
